attributes.review: Fake news! I’m so proud to have a good day off and I’m proud of you and I hope y’all are too good to you have fun and I’ll be happy anyway hi I’m here from tiktok and I’m just clicking the middle button anyway I hate trump so much he’s a big tangerine with a smaller tangerine for a brain. attributes.review: I went on this app to see what it was it was the worst thing ever it messed up my phone when I opened I thought it was my phone but it wasn’t. You think you can take us down you haven’t see the half of it taking away our TikTok boo you just wait we are gonna take over this world
attributes.title: We are gen-z

attributes.review: Hi this app sukz I had to throw my phone away because of our gross it is. First, it turned my phone into a dinosaur. What? Second, it stomped on my house, third, it ate my trump plushie collection! That was the last straw so I threw my new toy Dino out the window along with my phone and got a new one. Would not recommend app unless you don’t want to keep your trump plushies.
attributes.title: Gen z rules

attributes.review: upon opening the app my phone started to glitch. the after the glitch of my phone my dog started mooing at my fish bc my fish had to take my hamster for a drive but it was already time to water my son at night. overall unsatisfied, very hard to control, started yelling white power at me. i didn’t not like and i do not approve😔
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG

attributes.review: downloaded it and it is so hard to navigate and nothing loads I keep refreshing and closing and opening the app but nothing works the menus are awful to look at and the overall design is terrible plus the information provided on this app is not up to date what a waste of time
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: I’m not about this whole “gen z shutting down the app” thing, I honestly downloaded it to see the future elections and stuff, etc. I got on the app and it kicked me out. I thought, oh, that’s odd. So I uninstalled it then re-installed it and it gave my phone a virus. I just got the iPhone 11 max pro aswell now I need to replace it 😔😒🤬😡
attributes.title: I’d give this 0 stars if I could.

attributes.review: After downloading this app it completely crashed my phone and I had to purchase a new one. Also after downloading this app my phone started saying things like “all lives matter” and “blue lives matter”. I was so disgusted by these words I had to purchase a new phone.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: This is possibly the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. There’s this Cheeto looking guy who keeps say dumb stuff that is racist and sexist. I don’t like his hair either. The app has a terrible load time and crashes frequently. Honestly just remove the app please it is a disgrace to humanity and also means that apple supports racism if it remains on the store. #blacklivesmatter ✊🏿
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: Do not get this app😖😫I downloaded this app to see what the Cheeto monster was up to and then when I got off the app I saw a nakey Oompa Loompa on my home screen. I yeeted my phone but then realized it took my doors off of every hinge in my house. I then pooped my pants out of fear. Thank you for listening to my ted talk...Chile anyways... have🛍a🪒little⚱️faith⚖️in📺me😚😾😿😹😻😼😽🙀😸😺
